text: It's fine I started learning Japanese on Duolingo already
did you run hs init in your local folder where you want your theme to download to?

Should work if you create a local folder then run hs init and get the matching key for your portal.

then you can just run

```hs fetch theme-name .```
where “.” is the current folder

Thanks for confirming I haven't gone mad.

No issue doing this in Sandbox, it is just prod.

This is the error
If the theme is from the marketplace that could be the issue - to ensure the authors work isn’t copied
It is a purchased theme, that is a very good point. I will message the guy over at Clean Pro and see if this is the blocker. Thanks for your thoughts :slightly_smiling_face:
You’re welcome and best of luck :slightly_smiling_face:
Btw, might be some information here to guide you
<@UA5DFM7CK> any ideas if this is caused from it being a marketplace theme?

Hello everyone can someone help me with this

*<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM/Properties-are-not-shown/td-p/1032249|Properties are not shown>*
On contact tickets, only properties of contacts with the lifecycle stage "Leads" are showing. Properties of other contacts with lifecycle stages, such as "customers" and "subscribers," are not displayed on the tickets. How can this be resolved?

Hello, *Jolly* here! New here :relaxed:
I'm trying to use the 'Deduplicate Contact' code from Programmable Automation Use Cases to merge duplicate contacts, but I'm having a hard time deciding where or how to start.
I started with this workflow but on the Test Action, it says Error: Logs: WARNING: The logs for this function have exceeded the 4KB limit.
I don't understand the cause of the error. Would appreciate anyone's insight/help :hugging_face:
